title: Add About Florida Dave section with wave divider

requirements.summary: Add an 'About Florida Dave' section with biographical content to the frontend
acceptanceCriteria: A clearly labeled 'About Florida Dave' section is visible on the app (e.g., on the home/feed page or a dedicated About page/section).
The section contains a short paragraph with the described content: age, entrepreneurship, content creation, domain investing, location freedom, and beach living.
Text is legible and styled consistently with the rest of the app's design system.

file_operations.description: Create a new AboutSection component that displays the Florida Dave bio paragraph with appropriate heading and styling consistent with the app's design system using Tailwind classes and OKLCH color tokens.
Import and render the AboutSection component within the VideoFeedPage layout, positioning it above or below the video grid to make it visible on the main feed page.

requirements.summary: Add a subtle wave-shaped SVG divider adjacent to the About section
acceptanceCriteria: A wave-shaped SVG or CSS divider line is rendered adjacent to the About section.
The divider is subtle — not overpowering — and harmonizes with the existing color palette.
The wave divider spans the full width of the section container.

file_operations.description: Create a WaveDivider component that renders a subtle wave-shaped SVG divider using inline SVG with path elements. Style it with colors from the app's OKLCH color palette to ensure visual harmony. Make the divider responsive and full-width.
Import and integrate the WaveDivider component into the AboutSection, positioning it above or below the bio content to visually separate the About section from adjacent content.
